name: Cycle (616 GAMES)
description:
Camera: First Person.

Control: Mouse and Keyboard only.

Graphics: PSX graphics style, inspired by old ps1/ps2 games.

Duration: It's a short horror experience, 20 to 30 minutes.

Gameplay: Just walk around the scene.

WARNING: This game may be disturbing for some people. Contains terrifying scenes and sounds. We use a type of binaural audio that causes some discomfort and fear.

Play our games for free and get your name in the credits:

PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/616games
